All,

I am looking for some insight into a project that I've just begun.  W=
e are using an in-house developed code generator that uses an xml file and =
an 4 xsl files and transform them into four Java classes.  The Java classes=
 serve as the data abstraction layer.  I would like to maintain some traceb=
ility from the customer who describes the business process and the code tha=
t makes the calls to the database.  Has anyone had experience with this typ=
e of thing?  If so, please offer suggestions on how to use Junit to do this=
 and the tests that I might use.

Thanks,
David
